Tip of the Day
The base chance to find most Chests is 1/250, which you can increase with better gear and tools.

Fingersaw

The tiniest saw for the tiniest planks.

The Fingersaw item is a loot item.

Requirement

  • Have [1] Halfling Rebels faction reputation.

Attribute

+2% Double rewards While doing Carpentry.
While in the GDTE area.

Uses

Mysterious Merchant

Shop Name Payment
Mysterious Merchant 1

Sources

Chest Drops

Chest Name Quantity Chance
(Per Roll) 		Chance
(Per Chest)† 		Odds
Chest of the Halfling Rebels 1 6.667% 24.118% ~1 in 4

†Note: Chests roll for loot multiple times.
